charter.html:
Career Opportunities
During your affiliation with Oskoreia you will have the ability to earn your way into whatever rank you wish within our Organization. If you make yourself a valuable member, and put in effort to help us be successful, then we will in turn reward your service, whether its by helping you get the ship you want or whatever your goal is. If you show leadership skills then perhaps you will help as an officer during large military operations, or if you like showing off how efficient you can be as a miner, we will have the position waiting for the right person. Officers must be exclusive members. Whatever your personality, we will put you where your most comfortable and where you will have the best success.

Career Opportunities

If you make yourself a valuable member, and put in effort to help us be successful, then we will in turn reward your service, whether its by helping you get the ship you want or whatever your goal is.  If you show leadership skills then perhaps you will help as an officer during large military operations, or if you like showing off how efficient you can be as a miner, we will have the position waiting for the right person.  Officers must be exclusive members.  Whatever your personality, we will put you where your most comfortable and where you will have the best success.

headline.html: Were an Org that is both Military and Industry focused. We plan to be successful in the verse for years and will play all aspects of the game. Whether you want to be a crew member on a mining rig or captain of a capital ship you will have the ability to earn whatever spot you like.
headline.plaintext: Were an Org that is both Military and Industry focused.  We plan to be successful in the verse for years and will play all aspects of the game.  Whether you want to be a crew member on a mining rig or captain of a capital ship you will have the ability to earn whatever spot you like.

history.html: Were a group that has been together for a long time, we came from another game but most of us have been following this project for years. We have players of every type, from hardcore PVPers to hardcore grinders. All welcome!
history.plaintext: Were a group that has been together for a long time, we came from another game but most of us have been following this project for years.  We have players of every type, from hardcore PVPers to hardcore grinders.  All welcome!

manifesto.html:
About Us
Oskoreia- We are a growing Organization that plans to be completely self sufficient. We plan to cover all aspects of trade and industry, and have a powerful enough military to protect it all. Tho we might lean heavily into Industry, it is only to supply our military and members with all the tools they will need to be successful and defend what is ours.

INTEGRITY
We demonstrate the highest degree of integrity in every aspect of what we do. We are committed to instilling professional and ethical behavior in all our members, teammates, and associates.

EXCELLENCE
We set the bar for the best-in-class operational excellence. We empower our people to deliver customer-focused solutions with the highest levels of professionalism and commitment to excellence.

TEAMWORK
We promote and support a diverse, yet unified team. While respecting the individuality of our people, we work together as a team to meet our Organizations goals. We deploy willingly to the most remote and dangerous regions, leveraging our unique skill set in support of our members’ missions.

DIGNITY
We honor the rights and beliefs of our fellow members and the communities in which we operate. We treat others with dignity and respect.

Security/Military
This division will protect all facets of Oskoreia’s day to day operations and, working with the Industrial faction of the Organization, is its main source of active income. Our organizations military division will be capable of any military operations, provision of military and civilian extraction operations, asset protection services, conflict de-escalation, combating organized crime, spaceborne reaction forces, inter and intra-planetary combat operations, advanced training by certified experts, and more.

Exploration
Our Organizations Exploration division will provide premiere pathfinding services as well as expert jump point mapping, and active sector scanning. We will also be responsible for mapping planetary locations for suitable settlement and colony build sites.

Industry
The Industrial division of Oskoreia is a multifaceted role and exists to serve the internal and day to day sustainment of organizational operations, however external contracts for shipping and mining may be extended for zones too hot for unarmed traders. This division will conduct thorough risk assessments, comprehensive planning, and effective trade operations, as well as secure salvage and mining operations as dictated by UEE law.
